summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of West 67th Street from 32nd Avenue Northwest to 35th Avenue Northwest on the north by constructing watermains together with fire hydrants and the necessary appurtenances; all in accordance with Resolution No. 8379 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
